Tvos_GetTvOsConfigWsRequest.description: Request object for getting a specific tvOs configuration.

Tvos_GetTvOsConfigWsResponse.description: Response object containing a specific tvOs configuration.

Tvos_GetTvOsConfigsForOrgWsRequest.description: Request object for getting all tvOs configurations for the organization.

Tvos_GetTvOsConfigsForOrgWsResponse.description: Response object containing all tvOs configurations for the organization.

configs.description: List of tvOs configurations for the organization

Tvos_UpdateTvOsConfigWsRequest.description: Request object for updating a tvOs configuration.

Tvos_UpdateTvOsConfigWsResponse.description: Response object for updating a tvOs configuration.
